languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь сосредоточиться на человеке перед вами, но перед глазами все еще стоит зрелище {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}смертоносной пытки{/d}, которой он подверг свою жертву. Пульс учащается, кровь колотится в ушах, а на коже липким бисером проступает пот.{/n}

{n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}deadly torture{/d} he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь сосредоточиться на человеке перед вами, но перед глазами все еще стоит зрелище {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}смертоносной пытки{/d}, которой он подверг свою жертву. Пульс учащается, кровь колотится в ушах, а на коже липким бисером проступает пот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the deadly torture he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

{n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the deadly torture he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

{n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the deadly torture he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

{n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the deadly torture he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试着将注意力集中在你面前的这个人身上，但他{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}折磨受害者的情形{/d}始终回荡在你的脑海之中。你的脉搏变快了，血液在耳朵里一跳一跳，冷汗也从皮肤上流了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}deadly torture{/d} he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试着将注意力集中在你面前的这个人身上，但他折磨受害者的情形始终回荡在你的脑海之中。你的脉搏变快了，血液在耳朵里一跳一跳，冷汗也从皮肤上流了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas concentrarte en el hombre que tienes delante, pero no logras quitarte de la cabeza la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}terrible tortura{/d} que ha infligido a su víctima. Tu corazón se acelera, la sangre retumba en tus oídos y empiezas a sudar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}deadly torture{/d} he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas concentrarte en el hombre que tienes delante, pero no logras quitarte de la cabeza la terrible tortura que ha infligido a su víctima. Tu corazón se acelera, la sangre retumba en tus oídos y empiezas a sudar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前の男に集中しようとするも、彼が犠牲者に加えた、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}悍ましき拷問{/d}のイメージを拭うことができない。鼓動が早まり、耳には血の流れが響き、肌には汗がにじむ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}deadly torture{/d} he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前の男に集中しようとするも、彼が犠牲者に加えた、悍ましき拷問のイメージを拭うことができない。鼓動が早まり、耳には血の流れが響き、肌には汗がにじむ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez de concentrer votre attention sur l'homme devant vous, mais des visions de la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}torture{/d} qu'il a infligée à sa victime envahissent votre esprit. Votre pouls s'accélère. Les battements affolés de votre cœur résonnent dans vos oreilles tandis que vous sentez de la sueur s'échapper de chacun des pores de votre peau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}deadly torture{/d} he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez de concentrer votre attention sur l'homme devant vous, mais des visions de la torture qu'il a infligée à sa victime envahissent votre esprit. Votre pouls s'accélère. Les battements affolés de votre cœur résonnent dans vos oreilles tandis que vous sentez de la sueur s'échapper de chacun des pores de votre peau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, dich auf den Mann vor dir zu konzentrieren, doch du kannst das Bild der {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}tödlichen Folter{/d} nicht abschütteln, mit der er sein Opfer getötet hat. Dein Puls wird schneller, Blut pocht in deinen Ohren und Schweiß bildet sich auf deiner Haut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}deadly torture{/d} he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst, dich auf den Mann vor dir zu konzentrieren, doch du kannst das Bild der grausamen Folter nicht abschütteln, mit der er sein Opfer getötet hat. Dein Puls wird schneller, Blut pocht in deinen Ohren und Schweiß bildet sich auf deiner Haut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karşında duran adama odaklanmaya çalışsan da kurbanına çektirdiği {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ölümcül işkencenin{/d} görüntüsü zihninden çıkmıyor. Nabzın hızlanıyor, kulaklarına kan hücum ediyor ve teninde boncuk boncuk terler oluşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to focus on the man in front of you, but you cannot shake the image of the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}deadly torture{/d} he inflicted on his victim. Your pulse quickens, blood pounding in your ears and sweat beading on your skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Karşında duran adama odaklanmaya çalışsan da kurbanına çektirdiği ölümcül işkencenin görüntüsü zihninden çıkmıyor. Nabzın hızlanıyor, kulaklarına kan hücum ediyor ve teninde boncuk boncuk terler oluşuyor.{/n}
